attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review: this app is literally terrible. it supports a racist, homophobic, xenophobic, misogynistic monster. he should not be allowed to lead our country, and i can’t believe apple supports him.

attributes.title: Crashed
attributes.review: The app kept crashing my phone and restarting it. Might be my iPhone six

attributes.title: Terrible misinformation
attributes.review: This app has a monopoly over the information is spreads. It’s goal is to encourage propaganda and misinformation to form a cult like group of followers. Very disappointing.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: The app completely broke my phone. Like it exploded 🥵🤮😣. Because of this i will now be voting for Biden. I’m disappointed in the president and this disaster of an app🤡

attributes.title: Crash

attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️cancel trump🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: I rated this app a one because tiktok CAN’T be removed. Tiktok is the one app that actually gets me through the day without being bored out of my mind soooo, DON’T BAN TIKTOK!!!!!

attributes.title: 😤disappointing😤
attributes.review: I got this app Bc I thought I would get a free Cheeto subscription but it turns out I’m just getting updates on how bad it’s life is😞
